H0.text: In the famous story by Robert Louis Stevenson, what is Dr Jeckyll’s Christian name. Edward

H3.text: In the famous story by Robert Louis Stevenson, what is Dr Jeckyll’s Christian name. Henry

A4.text: It follows Gabriel John Utterson, a London-based legal practitioner who investigates a series of strange occurrences between his old friend, Dr. Henry Jekyll, and a murderous criminal named Edward Hyde.
